tricky
  • Reference

    Dates

    Vignette Author

    2017-03-06

    library(lubridate)
library(tibble)
library(tricky)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
tibble(
  date = seq(from = ymd("2016-01-01"), to = ymd("2017-12-31"), by = "day")
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    week = week_of_the_year(date), 
    day = wday(date), 
    year = year(date)
  ) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  geom_tile(
    mapping = aes(x = week, y = day), 
    fill = "black", color = "white") + 
  scale_y_discrete() + 
  scale_x_discrete() + 
  coord_equal() + 
  facet_wrap(~ year, ncol = 1)
